show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: Relational Reflections on Facing the Planetary Crises

title: Relational Reflections on Facing the Planetary Crises
content: Charlene Spretnak talks with Robert Jensen, author of Arguing for Our Lives: A User’s Guide to Constructive Dialog,... <!--more--> about pragmatic ways for individuals to join together locally to address the problems at hand, building the potential for linking up at the state and national levels; the importance of people-in-relationship; poem by Galway Kinnell
